description: This file defines a React functional component named 'App' that manages a theme toggle (light/dark mode) and renders a user interface with a button, logo, and links. It includes state management with useState and side effects with useEffect.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application's main interface with theme toggle functionality.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
